dimensions: Warp x Weft: 42.5 x 19 cm (16 3/4 x 7 1/2 in.)
title: Chintz fragment
medium:
Medium: cotton
Technique: plain weave foundation. Mordants for black and narrow red stripe applied by pen. Madder dyed. Blue applied by brush or immersion over resist. Yellow applied by pen or brush (chintz).
description: Stripes of blue and white flowers. Stripe on left on a yellow lattice background.
name: Chintz fragment
